title: 1xManager
author: 1xManager
content: 1xbit.com is looking to advertise their new promotion The World Cup Adventure. To help spread the word we would like to hire users from Member to legendary rank (1x Legendary, 1x Hero Member, 2x the rest of the rank) to help us out. If you post frequently in Gambling boards, we want to hire you.How to ApplyCode:Code:Bitcointalk Username:Profile link:Btc Address:Post Count: (including this one)Forum Rank:Wear sig and
